DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the effects of bile acids on GLP-1 secretion after Roux-en-Y gastric bypass.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Bile Acids on GLP-1 Secretion After Roux-en-Y Gastric Bypass
DOC.criteria: Uncomplicated RYGB performed minimum 3 months prior to the study. Fasting plasma glucose < 7.0mM, HbA1c < 48mmol/mol 3 months after RYGB. Fasting plasma glucose > 7.0mM, HbA1c > 48mmol/mol 3 months after RYGB. Dysregulated hypothyroidism, use of antithyroid treatment. Late diabetic complications as retinopathy, renal insufficiency, neuropathy or previous pancreatitis. Complications to RYGB: Documented reactive hypoglycaemia, severe dumping (vomiting, diarrhea, severe abdominal pain after food intake).
